channel.title: 101 on its Geo
channel.description: Recent content in 101 on its Geo

item.title: Machine Learning & Deep learning Terms
item.description: The Machine Learning Landscape 1. What is Machine Learning? It is the field of study that gives computers the ability to learn without being explicitly programmed. 2. Types of Machine Learning Whether or not they are trained with human supervision Supervised Learning Unsupervised Learning Semisupervised Learning Reinforcement Learning Whether or not they can learn incrementally on the fly Online Learning Batch Learning Whether they work by simly comparing new data points to known data points, or instead detect patterns in the training data and build a predictive model, much like scientists do.

item.title: Basics to get started with Tensorflow
item.description: 1. What is Tensor Just a fancy word for an n-dimentional matrix Or an advanced array Holds only single type They are the standard way of representing data in tensorflow. 2. Tensor Data Types python typeÂ Description tf.float32 32 bits floating point tf.float64 64 bits floating point tf.int8 8 bits signed integer tf.int16 16 bits signed integer tf.

item.title: Matrix Math and Numpy Refresher
item.description: image borrowed from UDACITYData Dimentions We fist need to understand how we represent the data specifically the shape the data can have. Eg: we can have a number representing a person height or a list of numbers for height, weight, age etc. May be a display picture represented as grid having rows and columns of each individual pixels and each pixels having its color value for RED, BLUE, GREEN. We describe this data in terms of number of dimentions.

item.title: Core Programming Principles
item.description: #integer x = 2 x 2 #float y = 2.5 y 2.5 #string a = "hello" b = 'hello2' a b hello hello2 #logical / boolean q1 = True q True
